verbs.description: softs - raw sugar prices dip after [V: matching] [ARG1: eight - month high] new york london oct 22- raw sugar futures on ice slipped on monday on technical weakness following an earlier rally while cocoa gained on short - covering dealers said march raw sugar settled down 0 07 cent or 0 5 percent at 13 82 cents per lb speculators halved their bearish stance in raw sugar to just 48 046 lots on ice futures u s in the week to oct 16 u s ivory coast u s eight - month ayenat mersie datagro senior vice president commodity futures trading commission new york nigel hunt boyd cruel agrilion cftc december london g crosse reuters high ridge futures london adrian croft james liddiard
